title: Video: Counties of Bath and Alleghany Middle Mountain Momma 2018
subtitle: We were the eye of the storm
author: cole
description: 21st consecutive year of running this race. The rain threatened us all night, but we prevailed. We had about 100 racers come out and had 35 in do the XXC 40 mile course. Thank you to everyone who came out and heres to a drier 22nd year!
loc: Douthat State Park, Clifton Forge VA
keywords: race, douthat state park, douthat, marathon mtb, xcm, cross country, charlottesville, richmond, xxcva lexington, xxc, enduro, bike race, mountain bike race
